newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ngai Hing to release results by end-Jan.
newsitem.headline: Ngai Hing to release results by end-Jan.

text.p: Ngai Hing Hong Co Ltd said on Friday that its results for the year ended June 30 are expected to be released by the end of the month following a delay due to an audit of transactions between the company and a distributor.

The company said in a statement that trading in its shares remains suspended pending the release of an investigation report into the transactions. Trading in the company's shares was suspended at the company's request in November 1996.
The investigation concerns deals between Ngai Hing Hong's Safeway Development Co Ltd unit and customers which offered an "exceptionally high profit margin".
